thread_replies.author: 花咲こより生収録ボイス
thread_replies.text:
Even the air at the moment the brush touched the paper at Kiyomizu-dera Temple was conveyed through the photograph   
I feel as though the single character "Bear" quietly bears the weight and fluctuations of 2025   
Along with this one character, I gently reflect on the year.

thread_replies.author: 時事通信社写真部
thread_replies.text:
In 2025, the kanji character "bear" was selected as the kanji of the year representing the mood of the times, and Seihan Mori, the chief priest of清水寺 in Kyoto City's Higashiyama Ward, wrote it out with a brush.

#今年の漢字 #熊

thread_replies.text:

thread_replies.text:
/／
Announced today
What is the
"Kanji of the Year"?
\＼

Today, December 12, the #KanjiOfTheYear representing the state of the world in 2025 will be decided

Starting at 14:00, the announcement ceremony at Kiyomizu-dera Temple in Kyoto will be
live-streamed on our special

thread_replies.author: 敏度
thread_replies.text:
日本の「今年の漢字」は台湾のと8割同じらしい。

--
【速報】今年の漢字は「熊」に決定！ 京都・清水寺で発表

thread_replies.author: てれびくん【公式】
thread_replies.text:
Today is #Kanji Day

The origin is the pun "ii ji (12) ichi ji (12)." In commemoration of this, every year at Kyoto's #Kiyomizu-dera Temple, one kanji character is announced as the #Kanji of the Year

#Moonlight Mask and others—early TV tokusatsu shows often had titles consisting

thread_replies.author: ✿︎ohana✿︎
thread_replies.text:
京都and大阪旅行  3.

3日目は清水寺！
卵焼きにだし醤油かけて食べる和食セット
美味しすぎた！卵が輝いてた

終わりがけの紅葉は
淡い感じの色で可愛かった
紅葉シーズンはもっと綺麗なんだろうなと
見たくなってしまった。。
食べ歩きして大好きなスヌーピーもいて
楽しかった*ˊᵕˋ*

thread_replies.author: RE/MAX KanaShizuスタッフの日常＠きらめき不動産
thread_replies.text:

思ったよりデカい

京都・清水寺で発表された #今年の漢字 は『熊』だそうですね
クマに因んだ写真をカメラロール漁って引っ張り出してきた2枚目、クマのケーキ

thread_replies.author: 旅犬
thread_replies.text:
The meaning of travel isn't just one thing, but above all, the very time that allows you to go on a trip is precious
There is time there that no one forces upon you, and your heart remains undisturbed.
It's not great to keep comparing yourself to your past self, but I'm just
